item.name: HyperV Logical CPU Guest Runtime %
item.key: perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor Logical Processor(_Total)\% Guest Run Time]
item.description: The percentage of time spent by the processor in guest code.

item.name: HyperV Logical CPU Hypervisor Runtime %
item.key: perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor Logical Processor(_Total)\% Hypervisor Run Time]
item.description: The percentage of time spent by the processor in hypervisor code.

item.name: HyperV Logical CPU Idle Runtime %
item.key: perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor Logical Processor(_Total)\% Idle Time]
item.description: The percentage of time spent by the processor in an idle state.

item.name: HyperV Root Virtual CPU Guest Runtime %
item.key: perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor Root Virtual Processor(_Total)\% Guest Run Time]
item.description: The percentage of time spent by the virtual processor in guest code.

item.name: HyperV Root Virtual CPU Hypervisor Runtime %
item.key: perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor Root Virtual Processor(_Total)\% Hypervisor Run Time]
item.description: The percentage of time spent by the virtual processor in hypervisor code.

item.name: HyperV Root Virtual CPU Remote Runtime %
item.key: perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor Root Virtual Processor(_Total)\% Remote Run Time]
item.description: The percentage of time spent by the virtual processor running on a remote node.

item.name: HyperV Root Virtual CPU Total Runtime %
item.key: perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor Root Virtual Processor(_Total)\% Total Run Time]
item.description: The percentage of time spent by the virtual processor in guest and hypervisor code.

item.name: HyperV Virtual CPU Guest Runtime %
item.key: perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor Virtual Processor(_Total)\% Guest Run Time]
item.description: The percentage of time spent by the virtual processor in guest code.

item.name: HyperV Virtual CPU Hypervisor Runtime %
item.key: perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor Virtual Processor(_Total)\% Hypervisor Run Time]
item.description: The percentage of time spent by the virtual processor in hypervisor code.

item.name: HyperV Virtual CPU Remote Runtime %
item.key: perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor Virtual Processor(_Total)\% Remote Run Time]
item.description: The percentage of time spent by the virtual processor running on a remote node.

item.name: HyperV Virtual CPU Total Runtime %
item.key: perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor Virtual Processor(_Total)\% Total Run Time]
item.description: The percentage of time spent by the virtual processor in guest and hypervisor code.

item.name: HyperV Number of Logical CPUs
item.key: perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor\Logical Processors]

item.name: HyperV Monitored Notifications
item.key: perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor\Monitored Notifications]

item.name: HyperV Number of Partitions (VMs)
item.key: perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor\Partitions]

item.name: HyperV Total Pages
item.key: perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor\Total Pages]

item.name: HyperV Number of Virtual CPUs
item.key: perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor\Virtual Processors]

item.name: HyperV VMs Critical
item.key: perf_counter[\Hyper-V Virtual Machine Health Summary\Health Critical]
item.description: The number of critical VMs on a host.

item.name: HyperV VMs OK
item.key: perf_counter[\Hyper-V Virtual Machine Health Summary\Health Ok]
item.description: The number of OK VM's on a host.

item.name: HyperV Virtual Switch B/s Received
item.key: perf_counter[\Hyper-V Virtual Switch(*)\Bytes Received/sec]

item.name: HyperV Virtual Switch B/s Sent
item.key: perf_counter[\Hyper-V Virtual Switch(*)\Bytes Sent/sec]

item.name: HyperV Service State
item.key: service_state[vmms]

discovery_rule.name: Hyper-V VM Discovery
discovery_rule.description: HyperV Guest VM Discovery Requires PowerShell script installed on HyperV Host.

trigger.expression: {Template Windows HyperV Host:perf_counter[\Hyper-V Virtual Machine Health Summary\Health Ok].last(0)}=0
trigger.name: Hyper-V host has 0 VMs in OK state
trigger.description: Number of VMs in an OK state.

trigger.expression: {Template Windows HyperV Host:perf_counter[\Hyper-V Virtual Machine Health Summary\Health Critical].last(0)}>0
trigger.name: Hyper-V host has critical VMs
trigger.description: The number of VMs running in a critical state.

trigger.expression: {Template Windows HyperV Host:perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor\Virtual Processors].last(0)}/{Template Windows HyperV Host:perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor\Logical Processors].last(0)}>5
trigger.name: Hyper-V Virtual to Logical CPU Ratio > 5:1

trigger.expression: {Template Windows HyperV Host:perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor Logical Processor(_Total)\% Idle Time].avg(#3)}<10
trigger.name: HyperV Host Idle CPU < 10%

item.key: perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor\Logical Processors]
perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor\Virtual Processors]
perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor\Partitions]
perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor\Monitored Notifications]
perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor Logical Processor(_Total)\% Guest Run Time]
perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor Logical Processor(_Total)\% Hypervisor Run Time]
perf_counter[\Hyper-V Virtual Switch(*)\Bytes Received/sec]
perf_counter[\Hyper-V Virtual Switch(*)\Bytes Sent/sec]
perf_counter[\Hyper-V Hypervisor\Total Pages]
perf_counter[\Hyper-V Virtual Machine Health Summary\Health Critical]
perf_counter[\Hyper-V Virtual Machine Health Summary\Health Ok]
